name: lout
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young man who behaves in a very rude, offensive, and sometimes violent way: Teenage louts roam the streets at night. Synonym
oaf old-fashioned
Related words
loutish
loutishness
Add to word list
Add to word list
a rude, stupid, or awkward man: He’s such a lout.
